channel.title: Item PK points [REP++ REWARD]
channel.description:
Well, I have added the PKING shop and everything.
When I added the items into the shop, they was worth GP, how do I transfer that to PK POINTS? It's something to do with my item.cfg REP++ REWARD!

item.title: Item PK points [REP++ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You added[quote=“Sp3ke, post:10, topic:301164”]Add this then :

	if (MyShopID == 1)	{
	    sM(getItemName(removeID) + ": currently costs " + ShopValue + " Pk-Points " + ShopAdd);
	}

Just change the shop ID to yours[/quote]

You needed to replace

And to reduce just replace ShopValue with ShopValue/1000 or whatever

Read full topic

item.title: Item PK points [REP++ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Okay, now it’s saying.

“Dragon Claws: currently costs 880,000,000 pk points (880 mill)”
“Dragon Claws: currently costs 880,000,000 coins (880 mill)”

How do I remove the coins one? Also, how do I reduce it. Im going to head to bed now but i’ll pm you my MSN[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2009, 04:36:49 am[/size][hr][quote=“davidi2, post:11, topic:301164”]hard, this is the easiest shit that exists…[/quote]

Naw, its being gay for me. Last delta source im gonna make xD

item.title: Item PK points [REP++ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Add this then :

	if (MyShopID == 1)	{
	    sM(getItemName(removeID) + ": currently costs " + ShopValue + " Pk-Points " + ShopAdd);
	}

Just change the shop ID to yours

Read full topic

item.title: Item PK points [REP++ REWARD]
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

	if (MyShopID == 1) { //SHOPIDHERE
		    if (pkpoints >= TotPrice2) {
			if (freeSlots() > 0){
			   pkpoints -= TotPrice2;
                            addItem(itemID, 1);
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                            if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                    > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                                server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                            }
                        } else {
                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                            break;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough PK points for this item.");
                    }
            	}

Read full topic
